channel.title: Profile: /usr/bin/whonixcheck Operation: exec Name: /usr/lib/apt-get-wrapper
channel.description:
whonix 9.6 workstaion , tester repository , sudo tail -f /var/log/kern.log:-
[code]Apr 13 21:52:01 host kernel: [ 18.725018] type=1400 audit(1428961918.587:10): apparmor="STATUS" operation="profile_load" name="/usr/bin/sdwdate" pid=1696 comm="apparmor_parser" Apr 13 21:52:01 host kernel: [ 18.799533] type=1400 audit(1428961918.663:11): apparmor="STATUS" operation="profile_load" name="/usr/bin/timesync" pid=1697 comm="apparmor_parser" Apr 13 21:52:01 host kernel: [ 21.942737] input: ACPI Virtual Keyboard Device as /devices/virtual/input/input6 Apr 13 21:52:04 host kernel: [ 24.757317] loop: module loaded Apr 13 21:52:04 host kernel: [ 25.129442] device-mapper: uevent: version 1.0.3 Apr 13 21:52:04 host kernel: [ 25.131211] device-mapper: ioctl: 4.22.0-ioctl (2011-10-19) initialised: dm-devel@redhat.com Apr 13 21:52:06 host kernel: [ 26.304017] eth0: no IPv6 routers present Apr 13 21:52:08 host kernel: [ 28.582536] Adding 522236k swap on /dev/mapper/swapfile. Priority:-1 extents:1 across:522236k Apr 13 21:54:46 host kernel: [ 180.034166] audit_printk_skb: 60 callbacks suppressed Apr 13 21:54:46 host kernel: [ 180.034169] type=1400 audit(1428962086.039:32): apparmor="DENIED" operation="exec" parent=11870 profile="/usr/bin/whonixcheck" name="/usr/lib/apt-get-wrapper" pid=11871 comm="apt-get-update" requested_mask="x" denied_mask="x" fsuid=0 ouid=0 Apr 13 21:58:06 host kernel: [ 380.112785] type=1400 audit(1428962286.119:33): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mkdir" parent=13506 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/home/user/tor-browser_en-US/Browser/updating/" pid=13526 comm="updater" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 Apr 13 21:58:35 host kernel: [ 409.462005] type=1400 audit(1428962315.467:34): apparmor="DENIED" operation="mkdir" parent=13599 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/home/user/tor-browser_en-US/Browser/updating/" pid=13619 comm="updater" requested_mask="c" denied_mask="c" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000 [/code]
